info.name: Healthlogue AI API
info.description: Complete API collection for testing Healthlogue AI service with organized agent folders

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "agent_name": "medical_followup",
  "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
  "session_id": "{{session_id}}",
  "sender": "SYSTEM",
  "success": true,
  "agent_response": "{\"followup_questions\": [\"What activities trigger the chest pain?\", \"Have you experienced similar pain before?\", \"Are you taking any medications?\"], \"count\": 3}"
}

item.name: Summarize Long Conversation - Shortness of Breath

body.raw:
{
  "agent_name": "medical_conversation_summary",
  "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
  "session_id": "{{session_id}}",
  "sender": "USER",
  "query": [
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "I'm here for a routine checkup" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "How are you feeling overall?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Generally good, but I've been tired lately" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Any changes in your diet or exercise?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Not really, same routine as before" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "Any other concerns?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "I've been getting headaches more frequently" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "How often?" },
    { "speaker": "Patient", "text": "Maybe 2-3 times a week now" },
    { "speaker": "Doctor", "text": "We should check your blood pressure and run some tests" }
  ],
  "features": [
    { "feature_name": "summary_length", "feature_value": 350 }
  ]
}

item.name: Plan Trip - New York to Paris

body.raw:
{
  "agent_name": "database",
  "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
  "session_id": "{{session_id}}",
  "sender": "USER",
